channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping outside 3 Millender Walk, 23rd September
item.description:
There is furniture dumped outside 3 Millender Walk on the Silverlock Estate. It had been there for several weeks so cannot please be removed and can a PCN please be issued
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41-72, St Helena Road, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Trailer, 23rd September
item.description:
This trailer and the other items left in the road next to it are not connected to the building work which is being carried out at 67 Swallowfield road. They have been abandoned and remain on the yellow line outside 69 Swallowfield road and causing a hazard on the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swallowfield Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Add wooden bollards, 23rd September
item.description:
Van drivers are driving over the grass and have destroyed it completely, which means that when it rains the hole that they have left in the verge becomes flooded.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southborough Lane, Southborough, London

item.title: Just dumped shopping trolley, 23rd September
item.description:
You have received a request via Love Clean Streets to remedy an issue within your Service Area Abandoned Trolley Lat/Long - 51.3873466, 0.0376254 what3words - limbs.train.atoms Nearest address - 9 Mackintosh Street, Bromley, BR2 9GT

item.title: Branches of the public tree interfering with telephone cable, 23rd September
item.description:
Due to recent high winds, branches of a public tree interfered with our landline telephone wire and caused the faccia board, on which the wire is attached to move and dislocate the guttering. Please advise when the relevant branches will be cut or trimmed, so that the faccia board can be fixed again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mayfield Avenue, Crofton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Self-sown tree damaging listed telephone box, 23rd September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thackeray Road, Clapham Junction, London

item.title: Sitting round & near tree on west side of silverthorne road between bewick and thakerary streets - have been there for eight years round the corner in thackeray street is another black plastic bag full of ??, 23rd September
item.description:
For eight years there've been five black plastic bags of something heavy that are round and near a tree on the west side of silverthorne road between bewick street and thackeray road. just round the corner in thackeray road is another black plastic bag of some heavy rubbish by a wooden bollard
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Silverthorne Road, Clapham Junction, London
